response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this product. I understand that this might be slightly below its perceived value to you, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
